item.description:
It's a casual monthly gathering. Come anytime for dinner, a drink, or just for the conversation. There's no agenda, so come whenever you can make it and don't worry about arriving later than 6:00.

We always try to meet in the back by the TV and fireplace. There are more tables to move around back there.

Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 20-30 attendees!

The meetups are very informal and generally there is no agenda. At 7:00 PM during the upcoming meetup, there will be an opportunity for attendees to share brief announcements. If you have something to share about a campaign, an event, a website, an organization, hereâ€™s your chance to tell the group. A sign-up sheet for announcements will be available from 6:00-7:00.


Note: This meetup event is cross-posted at the Boston Republican Party Meetup Group and on Facebook.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk to the back section near the fireplace & TV.
item.name: Boston Republican May Meetup
